name: The Old Playhouse WebGL/MAC
description:
You had a recording of your old friend who told you to go inside an abandoned building where fun used to happen. When entering inside the building you now know that something is inside there with you. Your job was to collect 3 objects in 3 nights... What great terrors await inside that building?

P.S: to see the whole game you have to click the screen in order for the game to have fullscreen.
